entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
